channel.title: Comments on: Homage to Horror Moms
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: kojishidae
item.dc:creator: kojishidae
item.description: That's endearing. I never thought of the bonds horror can create.
item.content:encoded: That’s endearing. I never thought of the bonds horror can create.

item.title: By: Vicki Williams
item.dc:creator: Vicki Williams
item.description: i'm so proud of you love you
item.content:encoded: i’m so proud of you love you

item.title: By: vivihaymes1@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: vivihaymes1@gmail.com
item.description: The best mothers day present Coleybear.. .I LOVE YOU ? BIG BIG!!!
item.content:encoded: The best mothers day present Coleybear.. .I LOVE YOU ? BIG BIG!!!
